meanings.definition: Done without will or conscious control.
meanings.sent1: The sneeze was involuntary, and I couldn't stop it.
meanings.sent2: Her involuntary reaction to the loud noise startled everyone.
meanings.sent3: His involuntary dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The involuntary twitch in his eye revealed his nervousness.
meanings.sent5: The involuntary tears streamed down her face uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: Not subject to control or choice.
meanings.sent1: The involuntary nature of the reflex surprised him.
meanings.sent2: The involuntary muscle spasms were causing him discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The involuntary decision to go left instead of right led to an unexpected adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her involuntary laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The involuntary shiver ran down his spine as he entered the haunted house.
